title: AFK pandemic
body: Has anyone else noticed the AFK pandemic in games lately? I haven't been playing ranked I'm on holiday and just playing a little ARAM or Poro King and seriously I have had more games with an AFK then without, some of the AFK's even by items. I know these games don't "mean" anything and they aren't important but it really isn't fun.

replies.body:
I think a lot of it are people that are having connection issues. Unexpected firewall errors (even when you were fine the game before), beta client crashes, and 10x the bugsplat errors. 

Also AFK punishments are likely to be handed out to some of these players (especially ranked leavers). AFKs are dealt with under the **leaverbuster** system, which you can read about *[here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)*
